column4: Got a doubt, I downloaded compiz, but none of the effects are working..!
I enabled cube, and rotate cube.. nothing..! also downloaded compiz fusion icon to be sure that compiz is enabled..
does  ps aux | grep -i compiz   report it as running?
do not understand the output, should I paste it here?
no. Use a pastebin.
*I* do not understand the output,  should I paste it here? <edit>
here is the link: http://paste.ubuntu.com/563966/
compiz is not running
try  compiz -replace & disown
something happened and I lost the title bars of all windows.. keyboard input was not working as well.. tried to launch compiz fusion icon, and brought it all back.. but still cant rotate the desk..
yes, because probably now compiz again is not running
it would be good to have the error messages that came when you tried to launch it
here is the link: http://paste.ubuntu.com/563969/
your graphic card is blacklisted
some drivers missing or something? mine is quite an old pc..! Blacklisted?? did not get it!
the compiz developers keep a list of hardware on which compiz is not supported. Your graphic card is on that list.
there used to be a way to work around this blacklist (even though it is not recommended), but Ubuntu disabled that in it's packages.
ohh..! :( that is bad!
anyway, I am quite happy with the way ubuntu looks by default.. Animations can wait for my next pc! :) thanks for your help and time! much appreciated! :)
no problem, have fun with ubuntu anyway
